meanings.definition: The act of walking or performing other activities while asleep.
meanings.sent1: Her somnambulation around the house at night worried her family.
meanings.sent2: Sleepwalkers may engage in somnambulation without being aware of it.
meanings.sent3: During his somnambulation, he managed to make a sandwich without waking up.
meanings.sent4: The somnambulation of the sleepwalker resembled a ghostly dance in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The somnambulation of the character in the horror movie was both eerie and fascinating.

meanings.definition: The condition of engaging in activities while asleep.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with somnambulation after observing her nighttime activities.
meanings.sent2: Somnambulation can be a dangerous condition if not properly managed.
meanings.sent3: His somnambulation led him to rearrange his room in his sleep.
meanings.sent4: The somnambulation of the patient puzzled the medical team.
meanings.sent5: The somnambulation of the young boy was a source of concern for his parents.
